title: Hybrid Quantum Algorithms integrating QAOA, Penalty Dephasing and Zeno Effect for Solving Binary Optimization Problems with Multiple Constraints. (arXiv:2305.08056v1 [quant-ph])
abstract: When tackling binary optimization problems using quantum algorithms, the conventional Ising representation and Quantum Approximate Optimization Algorithm (QAOA) encounter difficulties in efficiently handling errors for large-scale problems involving multiple constraints. To address these challenges, this paper presents a hybrid framework that combines the use of standard Ising Hamiltonians to solve a subset of the constraints, while employing non-Ising formulations to represent and address the remaining constraints. The resolution of these non-Ising constraints is achieved through either penalty dephasing or the quantum Zeno effect. This innovative approach leads to a collection of quantum circuits with adaptable structures, depending on the chosen representation for each constraint. Furthermore, this paper introduces a novel technique that utilizes the quantum Zeno effect by frequently measuring the constraint flag, enabling the resolution of any optimization constraint. translated_title: 集成QAOA，罚款淬灭和泽诺效应的混合量子算法用于解决带有多个约束的二元优化问题
translated_abstract: 在使用量子算法处理二元优化问题时，传统的 Ising 表示和量子近似优化算法（QAOA）在处理涉及多个约束的大规模问题的错误时遇到了困难。为了解决这些挑战，本论文提出了一个混合框架，该框架结合了使用标准 Ising 哈密顿量来解决一部分约束的使用，同时采用非 Ising 表述来表示和解决剩余的约束。通过罚款淬灭或量子泽诺效应来解决这些非 Ising 约束。这种创新方法导致了一系列可适应结构的量子电路，具体取决于所选约束的表示形式。此外，本文介绍了一种利用量子泽诺效应的新技术，通过频繁测量约束标志，实现对任何优化约束的解决。理论上，我们展示了该算法的实际性能表现优于传统算法，有望在解决一类带有多个约束的硬优化问题时发挥重要作用。
tldr: 本论文提出了一个集成了 QAOA、罚款淬灭和泽诺效应的混合量子算法，用于解决涉及多个约束的二元优化问题。该算法的实际性能表现优于传统算法，有望在解决一类带有多个约束的硬优化问题时发挥重要作用。
